Question: Caddxfpv Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Caddxfpv Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd

- Committed to providing image, VTX, and digital system accessories for FPV drones

- Aims to redefine traditional FPV flying and filming with a focus on excellence in research and development
- Customer service available for pre-sales and after-sales inquiries
- Contact information for R&D, partnership, marketing, after-sales/technical service, and order/shipping inquiries provided
- Emphasis on bringing better value to the FPV community through passion and energy
- Newsletter subscription for staying updated on sales and events
- Offers discounts and premium services for joining CaddxFPV
